key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on global suppliers for raw materials
Economic sensitivity tied to discretionary consumer spending
Competitive pressures in the outdoor and lifestyle products market
Environmental impact from production of plastic and metal products
environmental_issues: Production of plastic and metal products poses environmental challenges
Need to meet sustainability goals to avoid reputational harm
social_issues: Potential risks related to human rights, including child labor, health and safety, and discrimination
Reliance on HR for handling harassment and discrimination incidents
governance_issues: Dependence on external partners for supply chain management
Need for continuous innovation to maintain competitive edge
